title: Tokyo brushes up its taxi fleet for Olympics
text:
Tokyo brushes up its taxi fleet for Olympics 8:55am EDT - 01:06
Tokyo's taxi industry is undergoing some radical changes as Japan, already dealing with unprecedented levels of tourism, prepares to host the 2019 Rugby World Cup and the 2020 Olympics. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Tokyo's taxi industry is undergoing some radical changes as Japan, already dealing with unprecedented levels of tourism, prepares to host the 2019 Rugby World Cup and the 2020 Olympics.
